processing_time.form_info_en: Application for Waiver of the Foreign Residence Requirement (under Section 212(e) of the Immigration and Nationality Act, as Amended)
processing_time.form_info_es: Solicitud de Exención del Requisito de Residencia en el Extranjero (bajo la Sección 212(e) de la  Ley de Inmigración y Nacionalidad, según enmendada)

subtypes.subtype_info_en: Application for a waiver of the 2-year foreign residence requirement based on exceptional hardship or persecution
subtypes.subtype_info_es: Solicitud de Exoneración del requisito de dos años de residencia en el extranjero basada en dificultades o la persecución excepcional
subtypes.subtype_note_en: For Form I-612, Application for Waiver of the Foreign Residence Requirement, the Vermont Service Center processes only No Objection, Interested Government Agency, and Conrad cases. The California Service Center processes all other Form I-612 applications, including cases of exceptional hardship and cases of persecution.
